title: A Poem for Ankita
description: She holds a very special place in my heart, and my feelings for her are deep, genuine, and full of respect.
poem:
Like a soft breeze on a quiet night,
Your presence brings my heart to light.
In crowded days and silent hours,
You remain my calm, my unseen power.
author: Deepak Ranjan Rath
